question:
Which of the following people made attempts to evaluate national and per capita income of Indians?
1) Dadabhai Naoroji
2) William Digby
3) Findlay Shirras
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation: The British government never made any sincere attempt to estimate the national and per capita income of India. Some individual attempts were made to measure such incomes by Dadabhai Naoroji, William Digby, Findlay Shirras V.K.R.V. Rao, and R.C. Desai.
